text: A boy band is a vocal group consisting of young male singers. Boy band, Boyband, or BoyBand may also refer to: *Boyband (band), New Zealand musical group *BoybandPH, a Philippines band *Boyband, Israeli band *BoyBand (film), 2010 film *Boy Band (TV series), a reality singing competition ==See also== *Boy (disambiguation)
title: Boy band (disambiguation)
